mapper.select: SELECT T2.id FROM ( SELECT @r AS _id, ( SELECT @r := parent_id FROM t_department WHERE id = _id ) AS parent_id, @l := @l + 1 AS lvl FROM ( SELECT @r := #{departmentId}, @l := 0 ) vars, t_department h WHERE @r <> 0 AND id > 0 ) T1 JOIN t_department T2 ON T1._id = T2.id ORDER BY T1.lvl ASC
